instructions.list1: Keep the Mu tag close to the app during this setup.
instructions.list2: Press the Mu tag button now to wake it up.
instructions.info: Once the dot on the Mu tag logo starts flashing green, press 'Continue' below.

naming.askNameTitle: What is the name of this Mu tag?

adding.info: If nothing seems to be happening, then press the Mu tag button to ensure it's awake.

error.lowMuTagBattery: Unable to add Mu tag because its battery is below ${lowBatteryThreshold}%. Please charge Mu tag and try again.
error.newMuTagNotFound: Could not find a new Mu tag. Be sure the Mu tag light is flashing and keep it close to the app.
error.failedToAddMuTag: There was problem adding the Mu tag. Please keep Mu tag close to the app and try again.

warning.failedToSaveSettings: Your Mu tag added successfully but some settings failed to save.

error.lowMuTagBattery: Unable to remove Mu tag because its battery is below ${lowBatteryThreshold}%. Please charge Mu tag and try again.
error.failedToConnectToMuTag: Could not connect to Mu tag. Please ensure that Mu tag is charged and move it closer to the app.
error.muTagCommunicationFailure: There was a problem communicating with the Mu tag. Please move Mu tag closer to the app.
error.failedToRemoveMuTagFromAccount: The Mu tag device successfully reset and disconnected from your account, but there was a problem removing the Mu tag from the app. Please notify support@informu.io.

error.signOutFailed: Failed to sign out. Please try again.

locationPermissionRequest.title: Mu Tags Require 'Coarse Location' Permission
locationPermissionRequest.message: Please select 'Allow'. This is required for your Mu tags to have accurate and up-to-date locations.

signOutDialog.message: Are you sure you want to sign out?

dashboard.noMuTagMessage: Add your first Mu tag to get started.
